name: Monster Truck Extreme Stunts
description:
Monster trucks and extreme stunts are part of this racing game. Face the many Obstacles that come in your monster trucks way and conquer them to win the levels within the game. 

Check your driving skills on the path and jump over all obstacle to complete the level quickly. Perform all types of extreme stunts to make sure your Monster truck reaches the finish line. 

Your Monster truck will have to face a new racing track every time you start the game. Every other track will be more difficult and you will face many challenges to win the race. Every time you play Monster Truck Extreme Stunts there will be new Background to keep the game interesting.

# Features of Monster Truck Extreme Stunts 

• Different background & stages every time you play.
• Cool Graphics & excellent physics of the game character.
• Nice & easy to use controls for your monster Truck.
• Leader-board to compete with players scores from around the world.
• Enjoy the test of your driving skills as every level will be more difficult

# How to Play Monster Truck Extreme Stunts 

• Start the game with play button 
• Use left peddle for accelerator & right peddle for reverse gear
• Make sure you reach finish line to win that level

We hope you enjoy this game & have fun racing your monster truck.

If you liked this game or have some suggestions to improve the game please leave a comment or contact us support@techyee.com
